long.am:
Planyway is an easy-to-use extension for Trello and Google lovers looking for a better way of organizing teams and projects. From tracking deadlines and coordinating multiple projects to managing team workload and tracking time efforts - all of it can be done with the best possible visualization in the Planyway.

Open the Planyway extension right on the Trello page or keep planning on any website in the Google Chrome browser with the Planyway side panel.

Planyway easily integrates with Google Calendar and lets you see and edit calendar events in Planyway and vice versa. 

What can you do with Planyway?
âœ” Manage team workload and see who is doing what by when anytime
âœ” Record time your team spends on Trello tasks and make reports
âœ” Visualize tasks from multiple Trello boards and get an overview of all projects
âœ” Plan out deadlines and make sure everything gets done on time
âœ” Connect external calendars like Google, Outlook, etc. to see your full availability

Key features:
âœ” Timeline grouped by members, boards, lists, and labels
âœ” Daily, 3-day, weekly,  monthly views
âœ” Time tracking and estimations
âœ” Calendar integrations
âœ” Milestones
âœ” Dependencies
âœ” Export to CSV and Excel
âœ” Recurring cards
âœ” Advanced checklists

Best use cases:
The beauty of Planyway is its flexibility. No matter what your industry is, you can orchestrate any workflow with ease. Any doubts? Check out our use cases at https://planyway.com/templates 

âœ” Editorial calendar
âœ” Project management
âœ” Design
âœ” Agile development

long.en_GB,en_US:
Planyway is an easy-to-use extension for Trello and Google lovers looking for a better way of managing teams and projects. From tracking deadlines and coordinating multiple projects to balancing team workload and tracking time efforts - all of it can be done with the best possible visualization in Planyway.

What can you do with Planyway?
âœ” Manage team workload and see who is doing what by when anytime
âœ” Record time your team spends on Trello tasks and make reports
âœ” Visualize tasks from multiple Trello boards and get an overview of all projects
âœ” Plan out deadlines and make sure everything gets done on time
âœ” Connect external calendars like Google, Outlook, etc. to see your full availability

Key features:
âœ” Timeline grouped by members, boards, lists, and labels
âœ” Daily, 3-day, weekly,  monthly calendar views
âœ” Time tracking and estimations
âœ” Calendar integrations
âœ” Milestones
âœ” Dependencies
âœ” Export to CSV and Excel
âœ” Recurring cards
âœ” Advanced checklists

Integrations:
Planyway easily integrates with Google Calendar and lets you see and edit calendar events in Planyway and vice versa. Additionally, if you have your Google Calendar synced, you can easily invite people to meetings when scheduling new events. Apart from Google Calendar, you can sync Planyway with Outlook, Apple and other calendars.

How to get started?
Download the Planyway extension and open any of your Trello boards. Click the Planyway button in the top right corner and get it open. The Planyway splits your screen in two parts, so you can still see the Trello board while using the Planyway calendar. Also, you can keep planning on any website in Google Chrome with the Planyway side panel just by clicking the extension button in your browser.

Best use cases:
The beauty of Planyway is its flexibility. No matter what your industry is, you can orchestrate any workflow with ease. Any doubts? Check out our use cases at https://planyway.com/templates 

âœ” Editorial calendar
Bring your team of copywriters, designers, and editors together and create engaging content that converts
âœ” Project management
Make sure things go off without a hitch by creating a powerful project timelines and calendars 
âœ” Design
Streamline your workflow to deliver winning design projects with no extra efforts
âœ” Agile development
Coordinate projects from sprint to sprint to reach long-term goals faster and make cross-functional teamwork easy as never before
âœ” Resource planning
Track team workload and time spent on projects to optimize resources and processes
âœ” Social media
Create stunning content and attract a larger audience as easily as one-two-three
âœ” Event planning
Learn how to organize events easily when you have a lot on your plate: budget planning, promotion, managing times, etc.
âœ” Sales
Boost your sales performance and build strong client relationships with one central calendar to track everything from first touch to winning the deal
âœ” Customer support
Balance the endless flow of support tickets, help requests, and feedback all with a single tool. Build customer service that keeps your users happier than ever
âœ” Professional services
Win trust of your clients and smoothly run projects for multiple customers never missing deadlines 
âœ” Marketing
Keep track of marketing content, campaigns, events, and beyond all at the same place
âœ” Financial planning
Visualize all upcoming tasks in one financial calendar and distribute tasks across your accounting team
âœ” HR
Make your HR workflow flawless and let you focus more on people, not processes with our human resource online calendar
âœ” Education
Visualize course schedules, share assignments, collaborate with students and manage personal responsibilities with no hassle all in one calendar
âœ” Meeting scheduling
Stop wasting time on switching between a project management tool, calendar, meeting scheduling software, and mailbox and schedule meetings right in Planyway
âœ” Personal schedule
Organize everything in one calendar to make progress on things that are important for you
âœ” Project portfolio
House multiple projects under one roof with a portfolio. Navigate much easier, track how projects are progressing, and identify risks before big issues show up
âœ” Time tracking
Record efforts, set estimates, view reports so that you can plan workloads and calculate payrolls accurately


Download our mobile apps for iOS or Android to plan even on the go

long.id,ms:
Papar kad dan projek Trello pada kalendar untuk menguruskan masa, beban tugas dan tarikh akhir anda.

Planyway for Trello membantu anda untuk menggambarkan dan menyampaikan pelan strategik projek anda, berkongsi jadual dengan semua ahli pasukan anda, dan melihat tugasan setiap ahli pasukan dan masa untuk setiap tugasan.
long.it:
Aggiungi le visualizzazioni del calendario e il timeline al tuo Trello e trascina e rilascia facilmente le schede direttamente dagli elenchi di Trello per rendere divertente la pianificazione.

VISUALIZZAZIONE CALENDARIO
â€¢	Visualizza il programma in una visualizzazione giornaliera, settimanale o mensile
â€¢	Sincronizza le attivitÃ  di Trello con il Calendario di Google in due modi
â€¢	Collega calendari esterni (Outlook, Apple, Google, ecc.) tramite URL
â€¢	Coordina le tue attivitÃ  su piÃ¹ schede con la visualizzazione multi-scheda
â€¢	Pianifica il lavoro ripetitivo con le schede ricorrenti
â€¢	Visualizza gli elementi della lista di controllo con le date su un calendario

VISUALIZZAZIONE TIMELINE
â€¢	Crea piani di progetto utilizzando la visualizzazione timeline come gantt
â€¢	Raggruppa per membri per pianificare e monitorare chi sta facendo cosa e quando
â€¢	Raggruppa le liste per creare la tua tabella di marcia del progetto
â€¢	Raggruppa per schede per una panoramica di vari piani del progetto
â€¢	Evidenzia le date e le scadenze principali con le tappe fondamentali
â€¢	Visualizza le date dei campi personalizzati
â€¢	Traccia il tempo speso per i progetti su una timeline
â€¢	Panoramica dei piani per settimane, mesi o trimestri

TRACCIAMENTO DEL TEMPO
â€¢	Tieni traccia del tempo dedicato a una determinata attivitÃ  in una timeline o in visualizzazioni del calendario
â€¢	Confronta il tempo tracciato con una stima
â€¢	Crea report per ottenere informazioni piÃ¹ approfondite sul rendimento del tuo team

Punti salienti:
â€¢	Colora il codice delle carte Trello con le etichette
â€¢	Utilizza gli stessi tasti di scelta rapida di Trello
â€¢	Ordina le carte in base alla prioritÃ 
â€¢	Visualizza le schede Trello archiviate
â€¢	Filtra le schede Trello per membri, etichette, elenchi o campi personalizzati

Pianifica in movimento con le app Planyway per dispositivi mobili per iOS e Android

Planyway per Trello supporta una varietÃ  di casi d'uso, come ad esempio:
â€¢	Gestione dei progetti 
â€¢	Gestione del portafoglio dei progetti
â€¢	Sviluppo Agile e Scrum
â€¢	Calendario editoriale su Trello
â€¢	Richieste di progettazione
â€¢	Istruzione
â€¢	Tabella di marcia del prodotto
â€¢	Calendari del team e del progetto
â€¢	Supporto
â€¢	Pianificazione delle risorse
â€¢	Strategia di marketing
â€¢	Elenchi giornalieri di cose da fare 
â€¢	Calendario dei contenuti
â€¢	Servizi professionali
â€¢	Pianificazione degli eventi
â€¢	Vendite
â€¢	Risorse Umane

long.ml:
Plan Trello cards on a calendar and timeline to manage projects, team workload, and hit deadlines across boards.

Visualize your cards on a calendar or timeline across boards
Timeline and Calendar are great tools to visualize your project schedule in a different perspective. Use day, week, month, quarter or a year scales to schedule workload, plans, and roadmaps.

Create your project plan on a Gantt chart
Gantt Chart gives you full project scope and optimizes planning with critical path analysis, monitor project progress, manage resource utilization.

Manage your team workload with member lanes in timeline
Member lanes help you to visualize team workload with a clear overview of what everyoneâ€™s working on. You can see what each team member is working on any given day, week, month or quarter.

Coordinate multiple projects with board lanes in timeline
You can use board lanes to coordinate efforts among the different Trello boards. Each board has its lane showing cards, labels, assignees and completion status.

Schedule your day, week and month with the calendar
A calendar helps you stay on top of deadlines and visualize workload for the day, week, or month. 

Use milestones to highlight key dates and deadlines
Create milestones on your project plan to highlight key dates and deadlines. It will help you to plan all the other initiatives using reverse planning approach.

Sync with Google calendar
Sync Trello with your Google Calendar in 2-way to see the full picture of your schedule and stay up to date everywhere. 

Sync with third-party calendars via iCal
Use iCal format to sync Trello with third-party calendars.

Create recurring cards in Trello
Choose how often and how many times to repeat a card, and Planyway will take care of the rest. No additional card repeaters needed.

Highlights:
âœ” Drag and drop cards to Planyway Calendar and Timeline for easy planning
âœ” Color code cards with labels
âœ” Use the same Trello hotkeys
âœ” Mark cards as completed
âœ” Display or hide archived Trello cards
âœ” Use filters to focus on particular items
âœ” Connect external calendars by iCal (Google, Apple, Outlook)
âœ” Export to external calendars with live updating iCal link 
 
Planyway supports a variety of use cases, such as:
âœ” Product management in Trello
âœ” Resource management in Trello
âœ” Team management in Trello
âœ” Agile and Scrum development 
âœ” Marketing strategy
âœ” Editorial calendar in Trello
âœ” Content publications planning
âœ” Event planning
âœ” Sales management

** Update June 19, 2019 **
New Planyway button in Trello
Disabled Drop Card to Trello in onboarding
Added Trello board names in milestones

** Update May 20, 2019 **
Trello boards lanes in Timeline view

** Update May 2, 2019 **
Fixed latest Trello version compatibility

** Update Apr 24, 2019 **
Fixed latest Trello version compatibility 

** Update Apr 21, 2019 **
Trello members, labels, lists filters
Set dates button inside Trello cards

** Update Apr 12, 2019 **
Manual sorting in Timeline
Donâ€™t ask me again toggle when deleting Trello cards from the calendar

** Update Apr 9, 2019 **
Fixed latest Trello version compatibility 

** Update Apr 8, 2019 **
Planyway for Trello mobile app for iPhone and iPad
Optimization for Trello boards with 40+ members

** Update Apr 6, 2019 **
Hotkeys for Trello members and labels

** Update Mar 28, 2019 **
Video quick start guide
Trello cards duplicate action and hotkey in Calendar

** Update Mar 21, 2019 **
Milestones in Timeline

** Update Feb 28, 2019 **
Task list view for Trello cards in Power-Up

** Update Feb 6, 2019 **
Free/busy option for Google Calendar 2-way sync
1 day default duration for new Trello cards
Default Trello list for new cards

** Update Jan 18, 2019 **
Detailed view for Trello cards in Month View Ğ¸ Weekly Agenda

Note: Trello is a registered trademark of Atlassian, Inc. The developers of Planyway for Trello are not affiliated, associated, authorized, endorsed by or in any way officially connected to Atlassian, Inc and Trello, Inc.
